Title: Captain America: The First Avenger
Description: It is 1941 and the world is in the throes of war.  Captain America leads the fight against the Nazi-backed HYDRA organization.

Series.Name: Marvel Cinematic Universe Films
Series.Description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) films are a series of American superhero films produced by Marvel Studios starting in 2007 based on characters that appear in publications by Marvel Comics. The MCU is the shared universe in which all of the films are set.
